pullRequest.body:
This patch defines `MeromorphicAt`, for functions on nontrivially normed fields, and prove it is preserved by sums and products (routine) and inverses (much less trivial). Along the way, we define "order of vanishing" for a function analytic at a point (as an `ENat`).

---

nodes.body:
This looks great to me. I'm sure there lots more handy API that can be added in the future, but this seems a reasonable place to start.
I'll leave it for a maintainer / reviewer that actually uses the analysis parts of the library to look also, but as far as I can tell this is ready
